name: danial-devops
description: This is a reference project for the DVOPS subject.

scripts.frontend-instrument: xcopy public instrumented /I /E /Y & nyc instrument public instrumented
scripts.frontend-test-all: if exist .nyc_output (rmdir /s /q .nyc_output) && nyc --nycrc-path .nycrc-frontend cypress run --browser chrome && nyc --nycrc-path .nycrc-frontend cypress run --browser edge
scripts.frontend-test-chrome: if exist .nyc_output (rmdir /s /q .nyc_output) && nyc --nycrc-path .nycrc-frontend cypress run --browser chrome
scripts.frontend-test-edge: if exist .nyc_output (rmdir /s /q .nyc_output) && nyc --nycrc-path .nycrc-frontend cypress run --browser edge
